a1: I was sad to see them lose to Sweden this past World Cup.
q2: Do you think they could have won?
a2: No, I don't think they could have won it no matter the draw they pulled.
q3: How do you think the Switzerland team can improve?
a3: I think they need to work on their tactical and finishing skills
q4: Do you think they'll be a more solid team for the next World Cup?
a4: Switzerland has now been to the Finals, so yes they will be more prepared.
a5: stephan Lichtsteiner is their new captain.
